name: Step
description:
You carefully move 5 feet. Unlike most types of movement, 
Stepping doesn’t trigger reactions, such as Attacks of Opportunity, 
that can be triggered by move actions or upon leaving or entering 
a square. 
You can’t Step into difficult terrain (page 475), and you can’t 
Step using a Speed other than your land Speed.
rules: Your Speed is at least 10 feet.
